entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
